original_text:
Clouds and thick darkness are all around him;
    righteousness and justice are the foundation of his throne.
korean_text: 구름과 흑암이 그를 둘렀고 공의와 정의가 그의 보좌의 기초로다

sentences.original_text: Clouds and thick darkness are all around him
sentences.korean_translation: 구름과 짙은 어둠이 그를 둘러싸고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: righteousness and justice are the foundation of his throne
